g.text: 1. Mount PCB to base enclosure with M2.5 screws
2. Attach sensor array and ultrasonic units to front panel
3. Connect battery to BMS and insert into battery compartment
4. Apply rubber gasket to enclosure perimeter
5. Secure top and front panels to complete assembly
